name: Go No Farther
description:
LD48 submission... this is the result of me playing with Godot for the first time. Be gentle!

You're someone condemned to being some useless fragile ethereal creature... unless you bribe the devil with lots of coins.

Good news: you already have the coins.

Bad news: your coins are a treasure hidden deep down in what's now a very well known underground cave system, and it seems like your scary GO NO FARTHER sign (with an illustration of a grim reaper which is much scarier than yourself) only attracted more attention... maybe you shouldn't have written "there's no treasure worth dying for here" on the sign.

Worse yet, your coin chest's lid opened by itself and you have all your hard earned spanish doubloons floating freely, up to grabs.

Grab all coins under the allotted time limit while avoiding getting killed by much stronger divers with harpoon guns. Don't let the divers get your precious loot!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys = move your dumb ghost ass around the underwater cave passages

Each successive level has an increase in coins, but also an increase in enemies. Watch out!
